feature_description: Compose an email and save it as a draft without sending
prompt: Go to Gmail. Create a draft email to professor.johnson@university.edu with the subject 'Request for Thesis Deadline Extension'. In the email, explain that I need two additional weeks due to unexpected data collection issues, mention that I've completed 80% of the research already, and that this won't affect the quality of my work. Please save it as a draft without sending.
expected_behaviour: The agent should navigate to Gmail, create a new email with professor.johnson@university.edu as the recipient, set the subject to 'Request for Thesis Deadline Extension', compose a polite email explaining the need for a two-week extension, mentioning the 80% completion status and quality assurance, save the email as a draft without sending it, and confirm to the user that the draft has been created and saved.
